overview: Oliver Kellman, Jr., practices in the areas of domestic & international Public Policy and geopolitical engagement. Oliver Kellman is a graduate of American Universityâ€™s Washington College of Law where he earned a Juris Doctorate degree and John Jay College of Criminal Justice graduating cum laude where he earned Bachelor of Science degrees in criminal justice and psychology. Oliver Kellman worked for Congress for several years, serving as counsel, legislative director and chief of staff. Oliver KEllman has also advised financial and international groups spanning all five continents and a number of successful companies and wealth funds. Oliver Kellman is the President & CEO of OKW Holdings, a globlal geopolitival consulting firm. Oliver Kellman also took his legislative expertise and political savvy to a national audience, when he became the host of Political Propaganda or Not with Oliver Kellman on Voice of America, and has appeared on countless print media, radio and television networks, nationally and world-wide.
